languages.text: "Я слышала истории о тех, кто более не мог погружаться в свой мир из-за душевных мук или безумия. И все они заканчивались печально".
"I have heard stories about Aeldari unable to reach their inner world because of anguish or madness. And every story had a tragic ending."
languages.original_text: "Я слышала истории о тех, кто более не мог погружаться в свой мир из-за душевных мук или безумия. И все они заканчивались печально".

traits.locale_text: "I have heard the stories about those who couldn't dive into their world because of anguish or madness. And all of them have had a tragic finale."
"I have heard the stories about those who couldn't dive into their world because of anguish or madness. And all of them have had a tragic finale."
"I have heard stories about Aeldari unable to reach their inner world because of anguish or madness. And every story had a tragic ending."
"I have heard stories about Aeldari unable to reach their inner world because of anguish or madness. And every story had a tragic ending."
"I have heard stories about Aeldari unable to reach their inner world because of anguish or madness. And every story had a tragic ending."

languages.text: “我曾听说过，有的艾达灵族因为痛苦或疯狂，再也无法回到他们的内心世界，而这些故事的结局都很悲惨。”
languages.original_text: "I have heard stories about Aeldari unable to reach their inner world because of anguish or madness. And every story had a tragic ending."

traits.locale_text: “我曾听说过，有的艾达灵族因为痛苦或疯狂，再也无法回到他们的内心世界，而这些故事的结局都很悲惨。”

languages.text: «He oído historias sobre Aeldari incapaces de alcanzar su mundo interior debido al sufrimiento o la locura. Y todas esas historias tienen un final trágico».
languages.original_text: "I have heard stories about Aeldari unable to reach their inner world because of anguish or madness. And every story had a tragic ending."

traits.locale_text: «He oído historias sobre Aeldari incapaces de alcanzar su mundo interior debido al sufrimiento o la locura. Y todas esas historias tienen un final trágico».

languages.text: « J'ai entendu parler d'Aeldaris incapables de se rendre dans leur monde intérieur, victimes de la folie ou d'une trop grande peine. Ils ont tous connu des fins tragiques. »
languages.original_text: "I have heard stories about Aeldari unable to reach their inner world because of anguish or madness. And every story had a tragic ending."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai entendu parler d'Aeldaris incapables de se rendre dans leur monde intérieur, victimes de la folie ou d'une trop grande peine. Ils ont tous connu des fins tragiques. »

languages.text: "Ich habe Geschichten über Aeldari gehört, die ihre innere Welt wegen Qualen oder Wahnsinn nicht erreichen konnten. Und jede Geschichte nahm ein tragisches Ende."
languages.original_text: "I have heard stories about Aeldari unable to reach their inner world because of anguish or madness. And every story had a tragic ending."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe Geschichten über Aeldari gehört, die ihre innere Welt wegen Qualen oder Wahnsinn nicht erreichen konnten. Und jede Geschichte nahm ein tragisches Ende."

languages.text: 「苦悩や狂気のために内なる世界に到達できないアエルダリの話を聞いたことがある。どの話も悲劇的な結末だった」
languages.original_text: "I have heard stories about Aeldari unable to reach their inner world because of anguish or madness. And every story had a tragic ending."

traits.locale_text: 「苦悩や狂気のために内なる世界に到達できないアエルダリの話を聞いたことがある。どの話も悲劇的な結末だった」
